h2_title: Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)
content: Luckily, he'll usually stand around gloating after this, giving you time to heal up and ingest more consumables to buff up until the ring dissipates (You can also use Wind Tamer to immediately dispel the ring if you don't feel like waiting).
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'New_Thunderclap_Temple_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'New Thunderclap Temple Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai King Boss Fight - Yellowbrow (Round Two)'.
The content is as follows:
Luckily, he'll usually stand around gloating after this, giving you time to heal up and ingest more consumables to buff up until the ring dissipates (You can also use Wind Tamer to immediately dispel the ring if you don't feel like waiting).
